HUMAN RESOURCES, VENDOR AND CUSTOMER DATA (RELATING TO EMPLOYEES AND OTHER PERSONNEL) STORED WITHIN AND/OR PROCESSED BY OR IN CONNECTION WITH: Storage and distribution of internal (i.e. intra-group) emails (Exchange mailbox servers and Exchange SMTP relay servers); System for managing and authenticating access to DAN’s systems and networks (Active Directory);  System for collaboration between employees and client teams (LYNC).

privacyprograms:
The organisation complies with all aspects of the EU Data Protection Directive 95/46/EC and the UK Data Protection Act 1998.
We are registered and comply with the European Interative Digital Advertising Alliance OBA requirements.
